common.autoRefresh1m: Auto updates when new data arrives

overview.title: Overview
overview.subtitle: This month's stats, request trends, and channel distribution

trend.title: This Month Request Trend
trend.subtitle: Daily requests, one line per channel

distribution.title: Channel Usage
distribution.subtitle: This month's successful request share by channel

channels.title: Channels
channels.subtitle: Manage upstream API channel configuration and connectivity

autoSort.title: Auto sort preview
autoSort.description: Generate a suggested order for {{terminal}} based on multipliers (factor = real_multiplier / recharge_multiplier). It only applies after confirmation.
autoSort.noChange: No changes needed for current order

table.name: Name
table.empty: No channels. Click 'New Channel' to add one.

modal.name: Name
modal.realMultiplier: Real multiplier (multiply official cost by this)

deleteDialog.title: Delete Channel
deleteDialog.confirmWithName: Delete channel "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
deleteDialog.confirm: Delete this channel? This action cannot be undone.

toast.rechargeMultiplierInvalid: Recharge rate must be a finite number > 0
toast.realMultiplierInvalid: Real multiplier must be a finite number > 0

routes.title: Routes
routes.subtitle: Configure routing rules and channel priority

table.name: Name
table.empty: No routes. Click 'New Route' to add one.

modal.name: Name
modal.modelMatchHint: Leave empty to match all models for this terminal

deleteDialog.title: Delete Route
deleteDialog.confirmWithName: Delete route "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
deleteDialog.confirm: Delete this route? This action cannot be undone.

manage.title: Channel Priority: {{name}}
manage.description: Reorder channels to set priority (top to bottom)

table.title: Request Logs
table.subtitle: Filter and paginate all request records

onboarding.title: Sync pricing
onboarding.description: Sync model pricing from llm-metadata to enable per-log cost calculation and cost stats.

closePrompt.title: Close CliSwitch?
closePrompt.description: Minimize to tray and keep running, or quit the app?
closePrompt.rememberHint: You can change this in Settings

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.subtitle: Customize the look and feel
appearance.themeHint: Choose light, dark, or follow system

currency.title: Currency
currency.subtitle: Used for displaying units like Actual Spend (Est. Cost is always calculated in official USD)
currency.label: Default currency

channelProtection.title: Channel Protection
channelProtection.subtitle: Automatically pause channels after repeated failures
channelProtection.enableHint: When triggered, the channel will be skipped temporarily
channelProtection.windowMinutesHint: Count failures within this time window (minutes)
channelProtection.failureTimesHint: Trigger protection after this many failures

pricingData.title: Pricing Data
pricingData.subtitle: Used for per-log cost calculation and cost stats
pricingData.autoUpdateHint: When enabled, periodically sync pricing from llm-metadata

windowClose.title: Window Close
windowClose.subtitle: Choose what happens when you click the window close button
windowClose.behaviorHint: Ask every time / Minimize to tray / Quit

startup.title: Launch on Startup
startup.subtitle: Start CliSwitch automatically after you log in
startup.enableHint: Adds CliSwitch to your system login items
startup.launchModeHint: Choose how the window appears when auto-started

update.title: Auto Update
update.subtitle: Automatically check and download new versions
update.autoEnableHint: When enabled, periodically check and download updates automatically
update.promptDesc: A new version v{{version}} is available. Update now?

storage.title: Storage
storage.subtitle: App data and config file locations
storage.dataDirHint: Stores database, logs, and config files
storage.openInDevDesc: Open-folder support will be available in a future version

logging.title: App Logs
logging.subtitle: Manage application logs and storage
logging.levelHint: Record logs at this level and above
logging.retentionHint: Logs older than this will be cleaned up automatically
logging.retentionInvalid: Retention days must be between 1 and 3650
logging.clearLogsHint: Select date range to clear or clear all log files
logging.confirmDateRange: This will clear log files for {{range}}. Continue?
logging.confirmAll: This will clear all log files. Continue?
logging.invalidDate: Please select a date range first

maintenance.databaseSubtitle: View size and clear request records

records.title: Request Records
records.subtitle: Manage request records and error logs
records.clearRecordsHint: Select date range to clear request records
records.quickActionsHint: Clear errors or all records, and vacuum the database
records.confirmDateRange: This will clear records for {{range}}. Continue?
records.confirmErrors: This will clear all error records. Continue?
records.confirmAll: This will clear all records. Continue?
records.invalidDate: Please select a date range first

serviceInfo.title: Service Info
serviceInfo.subtitle: Service address for CLI tools to connect
serviceInfo.hostHint: Hostname / IP address for CLI connection
serviceInfo.endpointHint: Use this as the API endpoint in your AI tools.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: App version and system info
about.intro: CliSwitch is a local multi-channel CLI proxy to manage and switch between multiple AI API services. It supports Claude, Codex, Gemini, and more, with high availability and automatic failover.

update.readyDesc: Version v{{version}} has been downloaded. Restart the app to apply the update.
